Translations.Text: Ta Aaron kazaly yim, "O moyi lyudy, tse ye test dlya vas. Vash tilʹky Lord yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy, tak slidkuyutʹ meni, ta pidkoryayutʹsya moyim komandam
Vony skazaly, "My prodovzhymo obozhnyuvaty tse, do Moses povertayetʹsya
(Moses) skazalo, "O Aaron, shcho tse shcho zavazhalo vam, koly vy pobachyly yikh zablukayetesya
z nastupnykh moyikh zamov? Vy protydiyaly meni
Vin skazav, "O syn moyeyi materi; ne vytashchitʹ meni moyeyu borodoyu ta moyeyu holovoyu. YA zlyakavsya shcho vy mozhete skazaty, `you rozdilyly Ditey Izrayilya, ta ne pidkoryalysya moyim zamovam
Vin skazav, "U chomu sprava z vamy, O Samarian

Vin skazav, "ya pobachyv yaki vony ne mohly pobachyty. YA skhopyv fistful (pylu) z mistsya de kur'yer lyshyvsya v syli, ta vykorystav tse (shchob zmishatysya u zolotystu lytku). Tse shcho miy rozum nadykhav meni shchob zrobyty

Vin skazav, "Todi idutʹ, ta, vsyudy vashe zhyttya, ne navitʹ prybuvayutʹ zakryvayutʹ. Vy mayete pryznachenyy chas (dlya vashoho zaklyuchnoho vyroku) shcho vy mozhete nikoly ne unyknuty. Podyvitʹsya na vashoho boha shcho vy zvychayno obozhnyuvaly; my spalymo tse ta kydayemo tse u more, shchob zalyshytysya vnyz tam zavzhdy
Vash tilʹky boh BOH; poruch z komu nemaye inshoho boha. Yoho znannya okhoplyuye vsi rechi
My takym chynom rozpovidayemo do vas deyaka novyna z mynulykh heneratsiy. My vidkryly do vas povidomlennya z nas
Tsey khto disregard tse rodytʹ vantazh (hrikhiv) na Dni Resurrection
Vichno vony perebuyutʹ tam; shcho neshchasnyy vantazh na Dni Resurrection
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly rih duyetʹsya, ta my sklykayemo vynuvatyy na shcho denʹ syniy
Shepochutʹ sered sebe, vony skazhutʹ, "Vy zalyshylysya (u pershomu zhytti) ni bilʹsh nizh desyatʹ dniv
My znayemo tsilkom yikhni vyslovy. Naybilʹsh tochnyy sered nykh skazhete, "Vy ne zalyshylysya bilʹsh nizh denʹ
